name: Paint
description:
Sprinkle even more hues into FigJam and paint your Jams with your brand colors! Built for speed: use automatic one-click recoloring to quickly apply your palette, then use selection colors section to make more precise adjustments in bulk.


Paint is becoming paid soon! Get a no-subscription lifetime license for the early bird price! ü§ë


The default set of swatches includes a set of useful swatches which are not available in FigJam natively such as TRUE RED‚Ñ¢, bright blue and pink. Default swatches will be free to use forever!


Use your own colors

Get styles from the file: open a Figma file which contains solid color styles and run the ‚ÄúSave Palette‚Äù command.


Get colors from selected objects: select color swatches (rectangles or ellipses filled with different colors would do, but you can use anything) and run ‚ÄúSave Palette‚Äù command.


Video demo from the Figma team: https://twitter.com/figmadesign/status/1451669085335396352
